title: Community Meetup: Intro to Quantum Computing
description: A friendly meetup introducing the basics of quantum computing. Beginners welcome — light refreshments provided.

title: Women in Tech Panel
description: Panel discussion with women leaders from academia and industry about careers, mentorship, and inclusion.

title: Hands-on Workshop: Quantum Circuits
description: Practical lab where attendees will build and simulate simple quantum circuits on cloud providers.

title: Online Webinar: Quantum Algorithms Overview
description: Join us online for an accessible overview of quantum algorithms and their potential applications.

title: Networking Night — Startups & Founders
description: An evening for founders, investors and startup enthusiasts to connect and share opportunities.

title: Student Poster Session
description: Undergraduate and graduate students present research posters. Open to the public.

title: Hackathon: Quantum Challenge (48h)
description: A 48-hour hackathon focused on building useful tools and demos for quantum software. Teams of up to 4.

title: Coffee & Code — Study Group
description: Casual study group for people learning quantum programming. Bring your laptop and questions.

title: Lecture: Quantum Error Correction
description: An advanced lecture on quantum error correction techniques and their implementations.

title: Community Volunteer Day
description: Help us prepare event spaces and materials. No experience required — coffee provided.

title: Mentorship Office Hours
description: Sign up for 20-minute mentorship slots with experienced industry professionals.

title: End-of-Year Social
description: Celebrate the year's achievements with drinks, awards, and music. Tickets required.
